variable	p equal f_ave_p

print	"Average virial pressure from Berendsen MD: $p"
Average virial pressure from Berendsen MD: 12.8334464758309
unfix ave_p
unfix 2

#=====Langevin MD run====#
reset_timestep	0

fix		ave_p all ave/time ${nintervals} ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 500 ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 500 20000 c_p_all
unfix	1
fix		1 all nve
fix		2 all langevin ${temperature} ${temperature}  0.2 72300 zero yes
fix		2 all langevin 4.5 ${temperature}  0.2 72300 zero yes
fix		2 all langevin 4.5 4.5  0.2 72300 zero yes

thermo		200

log		log.langevin.txt
